parallel.distributed

Class PDBatchTaskExecutorClt

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.PDBatchTaskExecutorClt

  • public class PDBatchTaskExecutorClt
extends java.lang.Object
    class implements the "Client" for networks of PDBatchTaskExecutorWrk workers. Connects to a host server represented by the PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv object, to a specific host/port IP address.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PDBatchTaskExecutorClt()
      public no-arg constructor, will assume connection is to be made on localhost, port 7891.
      PDBatchTaskExecutorClt(java.lang.String hostipaddress, int port)
      constructor provides explicitly the server host/port connection parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHostIPAddress()
      the (internet) IP address of the server this client will be connecting to when submitting work.
      int getPort()
      the port of the server this client will be connecting to when submitting work.
      java.lang.Object[] submitWork(java.lang.String originating_client, TaskObject[] tasks)
      the main method of the class.
      java.lang.Object[] submitWork(java.util.Vector originating_clients, TaskObject[] tasks)
      same method as submitWork(client, tasks) but carries all the names of the hosts that have submitted the tasks to various servers (only applies when there exists more than one server in the system of servers, clients and workers).
      java.lang.Object[] submitWorkFromSameHost(TaskObject[] tasks)
      the main method of the class.

      • submitWorkFromSameHost

        public java.lang.Object[] submitWorkFromSameHost(TaskObject[] tasks)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                 PDBatchTaskExecutorException
        the main method of the class. Sends over the network the tasks parameter to the PDBatchTaskExecutorSrv server, who then distributes them to one of the available workers in the network. Method blocks until results are retrieved.
        Parameters:
        tasks - TaskObject[]
        Returns:
        Object[]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        PDBatchTaskExecutorException
